actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 with respect to effective dates of overtime provisions relating to employees in fire protection activities and law enforcement activities.

summary.text: Extends the effective dates of the overtime provisions relating to Federal and State employees in fire protection activities and law enforcement activities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 with respect to effective dates of overtime provisions relating to employees in fire protection activities and law enforcement activities.
